Title: SimpleSiteMenu - A nested SiteMap UL list
Description:
Simple nested UL/LI emitting composite web control which you can bind to a SiteMap provider.

I have provided some basic CSS and jQuery scripts to style it into a tree view.

Code has been derived from this sample http://bryantlikes.com/archive/2006/02/17/4839.aspx
